players.name: Alice
memory: Bob: "Charlie, I think Alice is the mafioso. They were investigated last night and we know they're not a villager or detective."
Bob: "I think we should lynch Alice because they were investigated last night and didn't deny anything."
You: "I have an alibi for Night 1. I was in my hideout, which is located behind the water tower. Only mafiosos have access to this hideout."
